breakfast.name: Sunny Morning Power
breakfast.description: Scrambled eggs with sautéed onions, potatoes and mushrooms. Toast served with butter and jam

breakfast.name: White Jumbo Omelet
breakfast.description: A two egg-white omelet accompanied with hash brown potatoes. Toast served with butter and jam

breakfast.name: Yala Special Breakfast
breakfast.description: Seasonal fresh juice, Yala style pancake, eggs any style, hash brown potatoes, grilled tomato and a banana

breakfast.name: Famous Eggs Benedict
breakfast.description: Sautéed ham & vegetables along with poached eggs topped with hollandaise sauce

breakfast.name: Full On Country Breakfast
breakfast.description: Seasonal juice, crispy bacon, two eggs any style & grilled tomato. Toast with butter and jam

breakfast.name: Nepali Simple Breakfast
breakfast.description: Nepali style omelet accompanied with seasonal fruits. Toast with butter and jam

lunch.name: Chicken Timmur
lunch.description: Tantalising diced chicken breast with fresh coriander, fenugreek and timmur (Nepali pepper). Served with mashed potato and salad

lunch.name: Yala Steak
lunch.description: Tenderloin steak cooked to your desire with mushroom sauce. Served with sauteed potatoes and seasonal vegetables

lunch.name: Tofu Butter Masala
lunch.description: Fresh Nepali tofu marinated in authentic butter masala. Served with rice and a side salad

lunch.name: Sesame Seed Pasta
lunch.description: Chicken or tofu with a delightful blend of mushrooms and sesame seeds

lunch.name: Mongolian BBQ
lunch.description: Your choice of chicken, beef or tofu pan fried in our classic Mongolian sauce. Served with rice and salad

lunch.name: Grilled Fish Fillet
lunch.description: Marinated grilled fish served with seasonal vegetables, sauteed or mashed potatoes and lemon sauce

beverages.name: Espresso
beverages.description: Single or double shot of freshly brewed Nepali coffee

beverages.name: Cappuccino
beverages.description: Rich espresso with steamed milk and foam

beverages.name: Café Latte
beverages.description: Smooth espresso with steamed milk and light foam

beverages.name: Nepali Masala Tea
beverages.description: Traditional spiced tea with aromatic herbs and spices

beverages.name: Honey Latte
beverages.description: Sweet latte with natural honey and steamed milk

beverages.name: Black Tea (Ilam)
beverages.description: Premium black tea from Ilam, Nepal

special.name: Manaslu Signature Momo
special.description: Traditional Nepali dumplings filled with spiced chicken or vegetables, served with tangy tomato chutney

special.name: Himalayan Thukpa
special.description: Authentic Tibetan noodle soup with fresh vegetables, herbs, and your choice of chicken or tofu

special.name: Woodside Special Burger
special.description: Premium beef patty with Nepali spices, fresh lettuce, tomato, and our signature sauce on artisan bun

special.name: Newari Platter
special.description: Traditional Newari feast with choila, bara, aloo tama, and seasonal pickles served with beaten rice

special.name: Queens Fusion Pasta
special.description: Italian pasta with Nepali twist - creamy tomato sauce with timmur and fresh herbs

special.name: Manaslu Dessert Delight
special.description: Homemade rice pudding with cardamom, nuts, and a touch of saffron - a perfect ending to your meal

special.name: Kodo ko Roti (Millet Bread)
special.description: Traditional Nepali finger millet flour pancake - a nutritious and authentic staple. Made from kodo flour and water, cooked to golden perfection. Rich in protein, calcium, iron, phosphorus, and dietary fiber. Served with yogurt (Dahi), buttermilk (Mohi), preserves, or fresh fruits.
